About Us

Aqua King Pools is a swimming pool specialist company based in Dorchester, Dorset. With over 25 years experience in the industry, we offer bespoke installation and refurbishment of both liner and tiled pools, including ancillary landscaping work such as pool houses, retaining walls and additional paving as required. Our pools are fitted with the latest technology air source heat pumps and automatic safety covers. We also offer a range of spas, hot tubs and saunas, as well as ongoing maintenance services.

We pride ourselves in attention to detail and achieving a unique luxury finish. Our company director, Shane King, will manage the project from conception to completion, providing a single point of contact, whilst guiding you through the design decisions and taking care of the day to day building operations.

If you are considering having a swimming pool installed, we offer a free initial site consultation and quotation service. Please call Shane today on 07989525558 or simply fill in our contact form below to request a callback.

Testimonials

"Shane and the team at AquaKing installed a superb pool for us in 2016. They also did all the landscaping and flint walls that make it such a great feature. Since then Shane has helped us on many projects and never fails to provide a great service with a cheerful 'can do' attitude. We can thoroughly recommend his company."

"Always a text away to talk through any problems. Will always come to help within 24 hours. 100% reliable"

"3 years ago we decided to refurb our existing pool. Shane King was recommended to us and helped us design our dream pool, helping with all aspects of liner and stone choices whilst explaining the best solution for the heating and pump system. Shane completed the pool on time and budget and I have since recommended him to friends."
